name: G Medya
tag_list: digital-pr, dijital-pr, online-press-release, pr-turkey, pres-releases, social-media, seo
overview:
G Medya is a true pioneer in Turkey in providing companies with a modern PR service to better connect with journalists and key opinion leaders. All pres releases and other PR materials are stored in an online social media newsroom and optimized for top search-engine rankings and social media.

G Medya is the premier media solutions platform for companies strategically targeting business decision makers in Turkey. We deliver millons of business audiences via our multiple distribution channels. Our platform provide comprehensive coverage of business news from a local, regional and national perspective.

offices.address1: Park Sok. No 10, Park Is Merkezi Kat:2, No:210
